name: When it comes to accountability:

metadata.response_options: ['Be strict. I need you to hold me accountable no matter what. Ask me the hard questions even when it might make me uncomfortable.', "Let's collaborate. I want to talk about what system of accountability might work for me. Let's figure this out together.", "I need a cheerleader. Please just encourage me. I'm doing the best I can right now, and I need your unwavering support.", "I'm self-directed. I'm going to work on these changes on my own and I'll report back when we talk next."]

name: Currently suffer from abdominal distension
synonyms: Do you currently suffer from abdominal distension? (bloating, swollen or tight tummy) Women please ignore distension related to your period.

name: Age other serious eye condition diagnosed
synonyms: What was your age when the other serious eye condition was first diagnosed?

name: Recommendation to repeat colonoscopy in XXX years
synonyms: What is the follow-up frequency (in years) assigned to perform a repeated colonoscopy test

name: Average weekly intake of other alcoholic drinks
synonyms: In an average WEEK, how many glasses of other alcoholic drinks (such as alcopops) would you drink?

name: Fever when IBS symptoms first began
synonyms: When your IBS symptoms first began (or up to two weeks before), did you have a fever?

name: Difficulty not smoking for 1 day
synonyms: How easy or difficult would you find it to go without smoking for a whole day?

name: Average monthly spirits intake
synonyms: In an average MONTH, how many measures of spirits or liqueurs would you drink? (there are 25 standard measures in a normal sized bottle; spirits include drinks such as whisky, gin, rum, vodka, brandy)

name: Family history
synonyms: Has one or more of your close family members suffered or is suffering from any of the following medical issues?

name: Family history of IBS
synonyms: Do you have a family history of IBS in your parents/siblings/children?

name: Satisfaction with bowel habits
synonyms: How happy/satisfied are you with your bowel habits?

name: Mother's age at death
synonyms: What was her age when she died?

name: Age stopped smoking cigarettes (current cigar/pipe or previous cigarette smoker)
synonyms: How old were you when you last smoked cigarettes on most days?

name: Diarrhoea when IBS symptoms first began
synonyms: When your IBS symptoms first began (or up to two weeks before), did you have diarrhoea?

name: Illnesses of adopted mother
synonyms: Has/did your ADOPTED mother ever suffer from? (You can select more than one answer)

name: Splenectomy year
synonyms: What year did you undergo a spleen removal (splenectomy) surgery?

name: Alcohol intake versus 10 years previously
synonyms: Compared to 10 years ago, do you drink?

name: Snoring
synonyms: Does your partner or a close relative or friend complain about your snoring?

name: Age when loss of vision due to injury or trauma diagnosed
synonyms: What was your age when injury or trauma resulting in loss of vision was first diagnosed?

name: Average monthly fortified wine intake
synonyms:
In an average MONTH, how many glasses of fortified wine would you drink? (There are 12 glasses in an average bottle)
(Fortified wines include drinks such as sherry, port, vermouth)

name: Renal Doppler [ultrasound]
synonyms: (22)? Have you had one of these tests in the last year? [Kidney Artery Doppler]

name: Average weekly champagne plus white wine intake
synonyms: In an average WEEK, how many glasses of WHITE wine or champagne would you drink? (There are six glasses in an average bottle)

name: Former alcohol drinker
synonyms: Did you previously drink alcohol?

name: Comparative height size at age 10
synonyms: When you were 10 years old, compared to average would you describe yourself as:

name: Time spent using computer
synonyms: In a typical DAY, how many hours do you spend using the computer? (Do not include using a computer at work; put 0 if you do not spend any time doing it)

name: Long-term/recurrent antibiotics as child or teenager
synonyms: During childhood or as a teenager did you receive long-term or recurrent courses (3 or more per year) of antibiotics (for example for tonsillitis or acne)?

name: Pre pregnancy genetic testing
synonyms: Have you done genetic tests before getting pregnant?

name: Number of days/week walked 10+ minutes
synonyms: In a typical WEEK, on how many days did you walk for at least 10 minutes at a time? (Include walking that you do at work, travelling to and from work, and for sport or leisure)

name: Chest / abdomen / pelvis / head CT / MRI examination
synonyms: (22)? Have you had one of these tests in the last year? [Chest / abdomen / pelvis / head CT / MRI examination]

name: Weight change compared with 1 year ago
synonyms: Compared with one year ago, has your weight changed?

name: Alcohol usually taken with meals
synonyms: When you drink alcohol is it usually with meals?

name: Length of mobile phone use
synonyms: For approximately how many years have you been using a mobile phone at least once per week to make or receive calls?

name: Father's age at death
synonyms: What was his age when he died?

name: Are you vegeterian?
ACE touchscreen question How many years ago was your last screen?
synonyms: Years since last breast cancer screening / mammogram

name: ACE touchscreen question Are you often troubled by feelings of guilt?
synonyms: Guilty feelings

name: ACE touchscreen question Over the past two weeks, how often have you felt tense, fidgety or restless?
synonyms: Frequency of tenseness / restlessness in last 2 weeks

name: Interval between previous point and current one in alphanumeric path (trail #2). Note that these intervals are unlikely to sum to
synonyms: Interval between previous point and current one in alphanumeric path (trail #2)

name: Participants were allowed up to 2 attempts to correctly recall the colour/shape shown to them earlier in the touchscreen section. This is the first answer they gave.
synonyms: PM: initial answer

name: This derived data field has come from Professor Jill Pell from the Institute of Health Wellbeing, University of Glasgow. Methods on how these fields were derived can be found in the Additional Resourc...
synonyms: Bipolar disorder status

name: This is the time that a participant looked at each word/picture group before selecting a picture.
synonyms: Duration of selection in each round

name: ACE touchscreen question Have you ever had a period of time lasting at least two days when you were so irritable that you found yourself shouting at people or starting fights or arguments?
synonyms: Ever highly irritable/argumentative for 2 days

name: ACE touchscreen question What was your age when injury or trauma resulting in loss of vision was first diagnosed?
synonyms: Age when loss of vision due to injury or trauma diagnosed

name: ACE touchscreen question What was your age when the blood clot in the lung was first diagnosed?
synonyms: Age pulmonary embolism (blood clot in lung) diagnosed

name: ACE touchscreen question Does this pain ever begin when you are standing still or sitting?
synonyms: Leg pain when standing still or sitting

name: The correct word associated with long was curtains.
synonyms: Word associated with "long"

name: This is the number of correct matches in the round. It should always be 3 for a 2x3 game and 6 for a 3x4 game, unless the participant abandoned before finishing.
synonyms: Number of correct matches in round (pilot)

name: Field description available on UK Biobank website
synonyms: Birth weight known

name: This is the interpolated time when the participant indicated the corresponding cancer was first diagnosed by a doctor, measured in years.
synonyms: Interpolated Year when cancer first diagnosed

name: ACE touchscreen question For approximately how many years have you been using a mobile phone at least once per week to make or receive calls?
synonyms: Length of mobile phone use

name: ACE touchscreen question How old were you when you last used HRT?
synonyms: Age last used hormone-replacement therapy (HRT)

name: ACE touchscreen question Have you tried to give up smoking?
synonyms: Ever tried to stop smoking

name: ACE touchscreen question Do you wear sun protection (e.g. sunscreen lotion, hat) when you spend time outdoors in the summer?
synonyms: Use of sun/uv protection

name: ACE touchscreen question Why did you stop drinking?
synonyms: Reason former drinker stopped drinking alcohol (pilot)

name: ACE touchscreen question What was your age when the heart attack was first diagnosed?
synonyms: Age heart attack diagnosed

name: ACE touchscreen question How many days is your usual menstrual cycle? (The number of days between each menstrual period)
synonyms: Length of menstrual cycle

name: Place born - north co-ordinate
synonyms: Place of birth in UK - north co-ordinate

name: ACE touchscreen question In a typical DAY in winter, how many hours do you spend outdoors?
synonyms: Time spent outdoors in winter

name: ACE touchscreen question Have you had facial pains for more than 3 months?
synonyms: Facial pains for 3+ months

name: Field description available on UK Biobank website
synonyms: FI11 : duration viewed

name: ACE touchscreen question Do you get short of breath walking with people of your own age on level ground?
synonyms: Shortness of breath walking on level ground

name: Field description available on UK Biobank website
synonyms: FI10 : duration viewed

name: Field description available on UK Biobank website
synonyms: Index for card A in round (pilot)

name: Average number of pack-years smoked by an individual each year, over their adult lifetime, calculated using pack-years data field. Pack years as a proportion of lifespan exposed to smoking is defined ...
synonyms: Pack years adult smoking as proportion of life span exposed to smoking

name: ACE touchscreen question What type of bread do you mainly eat?
synonyms: Bread type/intake (pilot)

name: ACE touchscreen question Do you add salt to your food? (Do not include salt used in cooking)
synonyms: Salt added to food

name: ACE touchscreen question In the last year have you ever had wheeze or whistling in the chest?
synonyms: Wheeze or whistling in the chest in last year
